1239150.name: Starpoint Gemini 2: Collector's Upgrade
1239150.description:
Get the all-brand-new and original soundtrack for the fan-favorite Starpoint Gemini 2! All tracks are composed and performed by none other than Nikola Nikita Jeremic. The tracks are automatically set to be used in-game as well.

The Collector's upgrade also includes a brand new Artbook featuring some of the best artwork, sketches and renders from the game!

Experience Starpoint Gemini 2 anew!

*The complete soundtrack in both MP3 and FLAC formats can be found in the game installation folder ...\DLC\CollectorsUpgrade\OST
*The artbook can be found in the game installation folder ...\DLC\CollectorsUpgrade\Artbook
1239150.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*, 俄语, 波兰语, 法语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
